name: Avoid Duplicate Posts
author: MyThemeShop

sections.description:
If you have more than one featured post sections on homepage and don’t want to repeat same post in different featured sections then you can achieve that by using this lightweight plugin

Support

All support for this plugin is provided through our forums. If you have not registered yet, you can do so here for FREE
https://mythemeshop.com/#signup

If after checking our Free WordPress video tutorials here:
https://mythemeshop.com/wordpress-101/
&
https://community.mythemeshop.com/tutorials/category/2-free-video-tutorials/

you are still stuck, please feel free to open a new thread, and a member of our support team will be happy to help.

Support link:
https://community.mythemeshop.com/forum/11-free-plugin-support/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the avoid-duplicate-posts folder to the to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Plugin will do it’s job without any configuration.
sections.faq:
Can’t see plugin options in WordPress Dashboard

This is the lightweight plugin without any options, plugin will do it’s job without any configuration.

short_description: Avoid all duplicate posts on homepage (applies to all posts, including widgets).
